column5: All the best to you Paul on your birthday  BTW, I thought I would remind you that I'm sure I read on one of your posts that the boat was an early present?? Just thought I'd throw it our there for the Merclady  And just to remind you, I have your present waiting for you. It's on the boat. In Streetsvile. You'll have to come and get it.  Happy Birthday Bud!!  Regards, Simon
I don't have a gift for you. But happy birthday anyway!!!!
Thanks Guys !!! Just the well wishes of people i consider friends is enough of a gift for me
Happy Birthday Paul, hope you have a great day
